attributes.action: Change the law to make taxpayer funded employees liable for the cost of their criminal or negligent acts in the workplace/on the job.
attributes.additional_details: EVERY DAY we hear about huge buckets of taxpayer pounds being handed over in compensation for the criminal or negligent acts of people who take wages and salaries out of the tax payments of the people who end up bearing the cost.  THERE MUST BE SOME SORT OF DISINCENTIVE TO COMMITTIING CRIMES IN TAXPAYER FUNDED PLACES OF EMPLOYMENT, THERE JUST HAS TO BE SOME SORT OF DISINCENTIVE.  TAXPAYER FUNDED EMPLOYEES ARE CURRENTLY EMPOWERED TO COMMIT MORE AND MORE CRIMES TO PUBLICISE AND DEMONSTRATE THEIR ARROGANT DISDAIN OF TAX PAYERS.
